item.description:
Kitty Whist Night.
New players welcome, we will teach you how to play.
We had 4, new and just beginning players, last time, so this a good time to start.

We had 13 people at our last meetup, it was full most of the time, but everyone who went on the waiting list did get a spot eventually, so do not be discouraged enough not to sign up on the waiting list, if full.

There is no charge for this meetup, however it is suggested that you get a drink or something there.
Also, if you send a dollar and mention "the Kitty Whist Players" to defray Liv and David's expense running the Games site, it would be appreciated.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the one with the decks of cards.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Kitty Whist at Gulu-Gulu in Salem
